Changelog

## `rig-core`

## [0.6.1](https://github.com/0xPlaygrounds/rig/compare/rig-core-v0.6.0...rig-core-v0.6.1) - 2025-01-13 ### Added - Add `from_url` method to Gemini client (#194) - Feature flag for CF worker compatibility (#176) (#175) - *(eternal-ai)* Eternal-AI provider for rig (#171) - Add gpt-4o-mini to openai model list (#187) ### Fixed - *(example)* ollama example uses wrong url ### Other - Add additional check for empty tool_calls ([#166](https://github.com/0xPlaygrounds/rig/pull/166)) - Mock provider API in vector store integration tests (#186) - fix comment (#182) - fix various typos
